RelatedSentence: Energy Secretary Carlos Jericho Petilla on Monday said three power plants in the Visayas went offline , including one each in Cebu , Iloilo and Leyte .
The Department of Energy expects them to be back online within this week .
said the Department of Energy is monitoring the status of the power supply on an hourly basis .
